doc.name: JAIBandSelect
doc.description: Copy bands of an image to another image. The number of bands to copy is indicated by the length of the array. The band to copy is indicated by each value of the array. For instance, if the user wants to duplicate each band of a three band image, the value of the array parameter should be {0, 0, 1, 1, 2, 2}.
doc.author: James Yeh
doc.property: The bands to copy to the output.
